nodes.text: The New Territories was the northernmost region of the galaxy. It shared borders with the Unknown Regions westward, the Interior southward, and the Slice eastward. During the Clone Wars, part of the Confederacy of Independent Systems's territory stretched from the New Territories to Hutt Space.

In Star Wars canon, the New Territories were first mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement for the roleplaying games produced by Fantasy Flight Games. The region originated in the 2009 Legends reference book The Essential Atlas, which was written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace.
